description: This schema represents a location without claimant data.

name.description: The name of the location (preferably in English).

country.description: The country of the location (can be a country code or name see https://www.iban.com/country-codes).

sector.description: The sector that the location operates in.

parent_company.description: The name of the parent company of the location.

product_type.description: The product types that the location produces.

location_type.description: The type of location this location represents.

processing_type.description: The type of processing activity that takes place at this location.

number_of_workers.description: The number of workers that are employed at a location.

min.description: The minimum number. Must be less than or equal to 'max'.

max.description: The maximum number. Must be greater than or equal to 'min'.
